idea-plugin.name: Claude Code Copy Code
idea-plugin.description: A plugin that copies the current file location with optional line numbers to the clipboard. Use Ctrl+Shift+Alt+K to copy file location. If text is selected, includes line numbers in format @/path/to/file#L1-5. If no text is selected, copies just the file path in format @/path/to/file.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0
  • Initial release with copy file location functionality
  • Support for line number ranges when text is selected
  • Configurable keyboard shortcut (default: Ctrl+Shift+Alt+K)

action.description: Copy current file location with optional line numbers
